tool_description: Dialex unscrambles natural text input, allowing your app or AI to work with spelling variations and nuanced use of language. Visit the website to learn more about Dialex in detail!
name: Dialex
title: Dialex

api_list.name: transform
api_list.description: Clean your dirty free form text by passing it to this endpoint.

required_parameters.name: data
required_parameters.description: Pass in your data here in the form of a string.

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: The language code for the language of your data. Currently supports 'en' for English and 'ms' for Bahasa Melayu.
